title: Operation Generator
description: Generates a custom FHIR operation for an existing HAPI FHIR server

project.description: Name of the Nx server project to add the operation to

defLocation.description: Official canonical URL, local file path, or URL to a JSON file for the OperationDefinition

defContent.description: Content of the OperationDefinition to use. If provided, this will override the definition URL or file path

name.description: Name of the operation to generate

directory.description: Target directory for the generated operation provider source file, relative to the server project source directory
